name: Windows Port Driver
summary: Learn about .PDR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Word with ProntoDoc for Word plug-in

content: PDR files may be loaded using Windows' "Add New Hardware" Control Panel. Once the hardware is located, select the PDR file location when prompted.

description: Driver file that allows certain USB devices, such as USB flash drives, to be recognized and used by a Windows-based computer; similar to a virtual device driver (.VXD file) used by other hardware.
